tool.name: Simple imputation

param.name: inputFile
param.label: Encoded Genotype data
param.help: (required)File must be tab-delimited. This tool expects that the allele data have been encoded/transformed to numeric. See Encode tool.

param.name: method
param.label: Select imputation method to use
param.help: (Default: Mean)This uses simple population imputate methods. Select from mean or mode

param.name: skipNum
param.label: Lines of metadata (starts with # )
param.help: (required)The GOBII hapmap format includes some metadata information regarding the data in the genotype file. These usally starts with '#'. The tool needs to skip these lines.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Simple Imputation using population mean or mode
-----
This tool does simple imputation on missing genotype data using mean(mean substitution) or mode.
-----
